document_data.name: Tiger
document_data.mainbody: '''Tigers''' were an uncommon species of large [[cat]].
document_data.Description:
Tigers were distinguished from other great cats by their orange fur and black stripes. Also, unlike other great cats, tigers were great swimmers.

Tigers were excellent climbers and could jump long distances. They could jump {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} into the air and leap outward to ranges of {{SIrange|30|50|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Sub-Species:
* [[Red tiger]], a species of hearty wild cat that could be found throughout [[the North]].
* [[Snow tiger]], a species of hearty wild cat that was native to the land of [[Rashemen]].

Ecology.Habitats:
Tigers were a highly adaptable species, known to inhabit both tropical and subarctic forests across the Realms.

In [[South Faer√ªn]], they inhabited the [[Ajmer Forest]] and the [[Forest of Amtar]].

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], like most mundane animals these creatures could be found in the [[Beastlands (plane)|Beastlands]],<ref> particularly on the layer of [[Brux]].
Ecology.Usage: ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold tiger hides for 25 [[gp]] a piece.
